comparison_vs_zorin.title: Aegis OS vs Zorin OS Pro Comparison

aegis_advantages.pricing: Aegis Basic $69 lifetime vs Zorin Pro $47 per major version
exclusive_apps: Aegis DeskLink - Multi-computer control (Zorin has nothing similar)
Aegis Mobile Link - Superior phone integration with SMS, calls, screen mirroring
Aegis System Monitor Pro - Better than Windows Task Manager
Aegis Backup Pro - Full backup solution
Aegis Security Center - Unified security dashboard
Aegis Theme Manager - 50+ themes vs Zorin's limited options
aegis_advantages.development: 25+ dev environments, all major programming languages
aegis_advantages.gaming: Full gaming support with Proton, Lutris, emulators
aegis_advantages.security: 38+ security tools vs basic security in Zorin

comparison_vs_zorin.verdict: Aegis OS Basic provides 10x more value than Zorin OS Pro at a similar price point, with exclusive apps that Zorin simply doesn't have.
